title: Danny & Academy Award-Winner Marcia Gay Harden
itunes:title: Danny & Academy Award-Winner Marcia Gay Harden
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes Queen/Icon/Legend Marcia Gay Harden to Everything Iconic. This Tony and Academy Award-winner discusses some of her most iconic projects-- First Wives Club, The Mist, Meet Joe Black, Angels in America on Broadway, Mystic River, Pollock, M...
description:
Danny welcomes Queen/Icon/Legend Marcia Gay Harden to Everything Iconic. This Tony and Academy Award-winner discusses some of her most iconic projects-- First Wives Club, The Mist, Meet Joe Black, Angels in America on Broadway, Mystic River, Pollock, Morning Show, Trophy Wife, Whip It, Mona Lisa Smile, and more!


For tickets to the Chicago live show: https://bit.ly/3bc6QLX

*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:
